Why I Started Krypto Hashers Community (KHC)

December 30, 2023

Krypto Hashers Community (KHC) was born out of the struggle of building alone. After years of jumping into projects with little knowledge, facing bugs without guidance, and abandoning many ideas halfway, I realized there had to be a better way. KHC is a space for developers who are learning, stuck, or just trying to grow. It‚Äôs not about perfection, it‚Äôs about building, breaking, fixing, and building again ‚Äî together. Whether you‚Äôre stuck on a bug or want to collaborate, you‚Äôre welcome here. KHC forever üïäÔ∏è
